title: Johnny Taylor: Harder to Motivate People to Work
content: The world of work has changed irrevocably since the COVID pandemic, and employee well-being is now far more of a consideration when job-hunting says Johnny Taylor, President and CEO of the Society for Human Resource Management (SHRM). What is more, the rise of AI is creating 'existential' angst among employees, as they question the longevity of their careers. Taylor spoke to Francine Lacqua on 'Bloomberg: The Pulse'. (Source: Bloomberg)
author: Bloomberg
